description: This Java source file defines an exception handler class for API documentation endpoints within a Spring application. It catches exceptions thrown during API docs requests, logs detailed structured logs, and returns a standardized error response.

classes.name: ApiDocsExceptionHandler
classes.description: A Spring exception handler class with high precedence for catching and logging exceptions from API documentation endpoints, providing structured error responses.

methods.name: handleApiDocsException
methods.description: Handles exceptions thrown during API docs requests, logs detailed information, and returns a structured error response.

methods.name: isApiDocsEndpoint
methods.description: Checks if the request URI corresponds to an API documentation endpoint that should be handled by this exception handler.

methods.name: getFullStackTrace
methods.description: Converts an exception's stack trace to a string, truncating if too lengthy, for detailed logging.
